subtitleNullable: A dataset that contains 10000+ wild elephant images
descriptionNullable:
The dataset comprises over 10,000 images capturing various aspects of Asian wild elephants in their natural habitat. These images serve as a valuable resource for a multitude of potential applications in artificial intelligence (AI).

This dataset provides a rich and diverse collection of visual data on Asian wild elephants. The extensive dataset opens avenues for numerous AI applications, including, but not limited to, elephant detection, early warning systems for elephant encroachment, behavioral analysis of elephants, and more.

The data collection process involved sourcing videos featuring Asian wild elephants from YouTube. Subsequently, a specialized algorithm was utilized to extract individual frames from these videos, creating an extensive image dataset. This approach ensured a systematic and comprehensive compilation of visual data, facilitating various research endeavors and AI applications centered around Asian wild elephants.
